channel.title: CVE Feed for SECOM -- Dr.ID Attendance system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SECOM -- Dr.ID Attendance system

item.title: CVE-2024-7732|2024-08-14T06:55:59.726Z -- secom -- dr.id%20attendance%20system
item.description: Dr.ID Access Control System from SECOM does not properly validate a specific page parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.
